sentences.sContent: She has a pale skin which doesn’t tan easily.
sentences.sCn: 她的肤色很白，不容易被晒黑。

sentences.sContent: She is tall and blonde, with a permanent tan.
sentences.sCn: 她个子高，一头金发，皮肤黝黑。

synos.tran: 棕褐色；[皮革]鞣料；马戏团

words.tran: 被晒成棕褐色的；深褐色的；已鞣制的
制革；制革法；皮肤晒成褐色
鞣革；把…晒黑；鞭笞（tan的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: if you tan, or if the sun tans you, your skin becomes darker because you spend time in the sun
If you have a tan, your skin has become darker than usual because you have been in the sun
